review: Easy to set up and use, would like more current movie options.
author: Dennis miller

review: We love it. We just canceled our cable in-lieu of this fire stick and the roku-3. both devises are great and very easy to use, we highly recommend them.
author: Ryan G. Osgood

review: Wish it would communicate with my iphone, but other than that is pretty good.
author: R S - Florida

review: The only gadget I've purchased in a long time that truly impressed me. The full experience is quality. Packaging is super smart and minimal, Installation and set up a breeze, on screen interface clean and intuitive, functionality slick.
author: Mark Steele "Bassey Spice"

review: This is a great way to access Prime movies, netflix, etc.  I have 2 problems with it - 1) It isn't as good at picking up my wifi as other devices in the house.  We've actually had to move our router to accommodate this.  2) You need a separate power source - I thought it'd use the power from the tv - I hate having more cords around.
author: nabs

review: This product is awful!  I bought 2 of them by the CLAIM that it was fast and no buffering.  It CONSTANTLY BUFFERS and FREEZES!!!  My previous Roku worked 10x better than this product.  I am so disappointed.  I like the appearance of the menus and the voice commands.  But the overall useage I would give 1/2 a star to.  I can barely use it cause it ALWAYS BUFFERS OR FREEZES.
author: RACHEL L. ANDERSON

review: For $19, this is a bargain.  I like the fact that it disappears from view, and am surprised by how much free content there is on Amazon Prime.  If you don't have Prime, this is a worthless product.  Also note that you need FULL Prime, not the gifted free 2-day shipping from a friend or relative.
author: KB

review: Great product with better picture quality than my original Amazon fire tv
author: Karen

review: Too many apps that are free on other platforms but cost money here.  Also, the app for airplay connectivity works only intermittently and Plex keeps freezing 60 seconds when watching a movie.  I play the same thing on my Chromecast using Plex and it works flawlessly.  I pre-ordered so got half off, but really disappointed with the fire stick.
author: Consuuumer
